original_text: And I understood and saw that God had not sent him, but he had pronounced the prophecy against me because Tobiah and Sanballat had hired him.
korean_text: 깨달은즉 그는 하나님께서 보내신 바가 아니라 도비야와 산발랏에게 뇌물을 받고 내게 이런 예언을 함이라

sentences.original_text: that God had not sent him
but he had pronounced the prophecy against me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 나를 향해 예언을 선포했다

sentences.original_text: because Tobiah and Sanballat had hired him
